Translation.Value: JailTime by ApokPT, fix by Lossy
JailTime: Cant clear inventory for player
JailTime: Full problem description:
No cells set, please use /jail set [name] first!
No hay ninguna celda llamada {0}
Celda {0} creada justo en donde estás!
La celda llamada {0} ya existe!
Celda {0} eliminada!
Celdas: {0}
Este jugador no puede ser arrestado!
{0} ya está preso!
{0} ha sido arrestado!
{0} ha sido liberado de la carcel!
Presos: {0}
Jail cells are getting dusty!
Nadie se llama {0}!
Has sido arrestado por {0} segundos!
Has sido liberado!
Vuelve a tu celda!
/jail commands: add, remove, set, unset, list, teleport
use /jail add <player> <time> <cell> - to arrest a player, if no <cell> uses a random one
use /jail remove <player> - to release a player
use /jail list players or /jail list cells
use /jail set <cell> - to set a new jail cell
use /jail unset <cell> - to delete a jail cell
use /jail teleport <cell> - to teleport to a cell
Has sido baneado por desconectarte mientras estabas preso
Has sido baneado temporalmente por desconectarte mientras estabas preso
